Actions.Name: Reckless Swipe
Actions.Description: Dash 1, then all adjacent foes must save or become dazed.

Actions.Name: Hack
Actions.Description: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.
Actions.Effects: Increase damage by +2 for each time this ability was used this turn. (4, 6, 8, etc)

Actions.Name: Rancor
Actions.Mark: While marked, if that foe ends their turn adjacent to the Battle Demon, they take [D]+[fray] as an effect. A foe can end this effect by ending their turn more than 2 spaces from the Demon.

Actions.Name: Heavy Cleaver
Actions.Effects: Critical hit (+[D]) on hit against bloodied foes.
